name: SaaS Blocks UI Kit
description:
SaaS Blocks is a collection of 70+ UI blocks and components for designers and developers to quickly create a SaaS website. It comes in 3 modes, 2 dark and 1 light, with more to come!


Grab the free version with 10 screens, and pick up the full version if you like (pay as you want pricing!)
